skills.name: Install Semantic UI
skills.pattern: npm install semantic-ui-css

skills.name: CDN Include
skills.pattern: <link rel='stylesheet' href='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui@2.5.0/dist/semantic.min.css'>

skills.name: JavaScript

<script src='https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js'></script>
<script src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui@2.5.0/dist/semantic.min.js'></script>
